section:
How to get help with using PLD
We provide help in two methods: listserver and IRC.
Listserver
There are currently two e-lists, destined for End Users:
pld-users-en - in English
pld-users-pl - in Polish
Other languages would be added on request.
&listserver;
IRC
IF you want to meet other PLD Linux Distribution End Users, please join #PLDhelp channel on IrcNET.
&ircnet;
